short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Will Make Your New Tab Page Dark Black

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes your new tab page dark and replaces the default one. As lightweight as possible: no permissions, no background tasks, literally one line of code that says make your new tab page black.
